title: Deadly Bloodlines
description: “Dead body at Galleon Bay.”Here we go again…It’s been 20 years since Inspector Angel’s mother reigned terror on the island of Grand Cayman.Now there’s a copycat killer on the loose and she’s assigned to the case.In this haunting tale of déjà vu, Angel is forced to face the past - in more ways than one.When paradise becomes a living nightmare, Angel’s former fling, Bren McDougal, pops back into the picture and it’s clear that the two have unfinished business.Will this love affair cloud her judgment and distract her from the case?Will Angel fall victim to the copycat killer’s bloodthirsty game?One thing’s for certain…The ending of this story is one you will NEVER expect.
author: Elke Feuer
